endpoints.description: Add a new patient to the system database.
Retrieve the health report generated for the specified patient.
Update the medical information of an existing patient.
Submit new health data for the specified patient.
Access predictive analytics based on aggregated patient data.
Retrieve summarized insights from health data.
Remove a patient's information completely from the system.
Get a list of health monitoring devices currently supported.
Create a new alert based on specific health data triggers.
Fetch historical reports for analysis and review.
